CODE.item: * MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO
CONCATENATE LV_LTX SY-DATUM+6(2) ',' SY-DATUM+0(4) INTO LV_DATE SEPARATED BY SPACE.

item.TDLINE: PERS: &SY-DATUM+6(4)& : &WA_EMP_INF-CHRONO&
PERS: &SY-DATUM+6(4)& : &WA_EMP_INF-CHRONO&
&LV_DATE&
<C1>&WA_EMP_INF-ENAME&</>
<C1>&WA_EMP_INF-STREETADDRESS&</>
<C1>&WA_EMP_INF-LOCALITY&</><C1> </>
<C1>&WA_EMP_INF-STATE&</><C1> - &WA_EMP_INF-POSTALCODE&</>
Dear <C1>&WA_EMP_INF-ATEXT&</><C1>&WA_EMP_INF-NACHN&</><C1>,</>
Further to our letter dated <C1>&WA_EMP_INF-OFLDAT&</> we are pleased
to inform you that on successful completion of your training,you have
been absorbed in the regular services of the company as <C1>"
&WA_EMP_INF-POSTX&"</>and presently located at <C1>
&WA_EMP_INF-ZZLOC_TEXT&</> on the following terms and conditions and
those mentioned in the attachment:
1. Your appointment will be effective from <C1>
&WA_EMP_INF-ABSORPTIONDATE&</><C1>.</>
2 .You will be paid remuneration as follows:
Dear <C1>&WA_EMP_INF-ATEXT&</><C1>&WA_EMP_INF-NACHN&</><C1>,</>
Further to our letter dated <C1>&WA_EMP_INF-OFLDAT&</> we are pleased
to inform you that on successful completion of your training,you have
been absorbed in the regular services of the company as <C1>"
&WA_EMP_INF-POSTX&"</>and presently located at <C1>
&WA_EMP_INF-ZZLOC_TEXT&</> on the following terms and conditions and
those mentioned in the attachment:
1. Your appointment will be effective from <C1>
&WA_EMP_INF-ABSORPTIONDATE&</><C1>.</>
2 .You will be paid remuneration as follows:
&WA_SAL-SEQNO&
&WA_SAL-TEXT1&<C1>&WA_SAL-WORDS&</>&WA_SAL-TEXT3& <C1>&WA_SAL-PERSK&</>
&WA_SAL-TEXT4&
&WA_SAL-SEQNO&
&WA_SAL-TEXT1& <C1>&WA_SAL-WORDS&</> &WA_SAL-TEXT2& &WA_SAL-TEXT3&
No other allowance or free amenities will be allowed.
You will be on probation for six months from the date of your reporting
for duty. If the Management is not satisfied with your work and / or
conduct, the period of probation will be liable to such extension as the
Management decides. Notwithstanding this, your job may be terminated
within 24 hours notice from either side until you are confirmed in this
organization where after the termination notice shall be one month from
either side.
As per our Company Policy, your retirement age shall be 58 years.
You will keep in confidence any business or trade secret or any other
information of the Company and will not use such secret or information
other than in the course of the Company’s business or divulge such
information to outsiders or unauthorized persons either while employed
or afterwards.
The Company has absolute right to alter and amend the Terms and
Conditions of employment at any time without assigning any reasons.
If the above/attached terms and conditions are acceptable to you, please
return the duplicate copy of this letter of appointment along with the
attachments i.e. Service Agreement and Terms & Conditions duly
signed in token of your acceptance.
Thanking you,
INDOFIL INDUSTRIES LIMITED
<C1>&WA_EMP_INF-HNAME&</>
<C1>&WA_EMP_INF-NAMEOFPOSITION&</><C1>,,,,,,
<C1>I accept all the terms & conditions </>
<C1>Stated here in above.</>
<C1>Encl: a/a</>
<C1>cc : Payroll

The Company has absolute right to alter and amend the Terms and

Thanking you,
